guild.name: {{ site.servername | xml_escape | replace: site.data.strings.newline, '\n' }}
guild.description: {{ site.description | xml_escape | strip_html | truncate:60 | replace: site.data.strings.newline, '\n' }}
guild.long_description: {% if site.long_description %}{{ site.long_description | xml_escape | replace: site.data.strings.newline, '\n' }}{% else %}{% endif %}
guild.url_safe: {{ site.servername | xml_escape | downcase | replace:' ', '' | replace: site.data.strings.newline, '\n' }}
guild.verified: {% if site.verified %}{{ site.verified | xml_escape | replace: site.data.strings.newline, '\n' }}{% else %}false{% endif %}
